subject: Re: Sharing our research
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Very cool. That's what I was trying to say, what the originator, and 
early users of the is stuff say and do now has become irrelevant. The 
geni is out of bottle. I don't forsee any problems.  

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Well, our main goal here is to research and share. It looks like our 
sharing is having a big impact, with a major player in the field of 
paranormal helping us to share our research.
> Stephen Wagner writes about Paranormal Phenomena for the very popular 
website, About.com. In an article he wrote yesterday, he tells his 
readers about the Radio Shack Hack. Steve even went out and bought a 
12-470 and hacked it!
> Read his article here: http://paranormal.about.com/b/2007/12/13/a-
ghost-box-for-under-100.htm
>
